resources.string:
This app was created to provide an easy way to change your music as you're doing other things, without having to fumble through your apps to find your music player.
 
 Copyright © 2013-2015 Mike Korcha.
 
 Credit to:
 • Jay Weisskopf for SliderPreference
 • Sergey Margaritov for ColorPickerPreference
 • Base for Floating Action Button
 • wada811 for Material Colors XML
 • Iconmonstr for icons
 • StackOverflow and Room 15
